summary:
Makes the weather on Solstheim more extreme similar to morrowind
-Increased Wind Speed
-More dense fog
descriptionHtml:
#REQUIRES DRAGONBORN DLC#
#STILL CURRENTLY A WORK IN PROGRESS# 
After playing Dragonborn dlc on Solstheim island for some time I realised..\"hey, I am very close to a volcano and the weather isn\'t that bad...\"

So I decided to change the weather conditions to make you feel like a badass adventuring solstheim

Features:
-More dense fog
-Increased Wind Speed
-Closer fog

Coming soon:
-Red like ash blizzard similar to morrowind(?)
-Realistic conditions depending on time of day.

Judgement/criticism is much appreciated so I can make this mod better since this is the second mod I ever made
If anyone wants to work on this mod with me that would be appreciated OR  you have more experience and have a better idea of this I might share author permissions(unlikely)
author: markorply
